seoConfig.tagline: Free Online Toolkit - Professional Tools for Everyone

globalSchemaMarkup.name: 30tools - Free Online Toolkit

image.seoTitle: Free Image Tools Online - Compress, Convert, Edit Images | 30tools

benefits: Reduce image file sizes up to 90% while maintaining quality
Convert between all major image formats instantly
AI-powered background removal with precision
Batch processing for multiple images
No watermarks or file size limits
100% secure - all processing done locally

howItWorks.title: Upload Your Files
howItWorks.description: Select or drag and drop your files into the tool. All processing happens locally in your browser for maximum security.

howItWorks.title: Choose Settings
howItWorks.description: Customize quality, format, and other options based on your specific needs. Preview changes in real-time.

howItWorks.title: Download Results
howItWorks.description: Get your processed files instantly. No watermarks, no registration required, completely free to use.

features: 100% Free - No hidden costs or subscriptions
Secure Processing - All work done locally in your browser
No File Limits - Process files of any size
Fast Results - Optimized for speed and efficiency
Mobile Friendly - Works on all devices and browsers
No Registration - Start using tools immediately

faqs.question: Are these tools really free to use?
faqs.answer: Yes, all tools on 30tools are completely free with no hidden costs, subscriptions, or premium features. You get full access to all functionality.

faqs.question: Is my data secure when using these tools?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. All processing happens locally in your browser - your files never leave your device. We don't store, access, or transmit your data.

faqs.question: Do I need to create an account?
faqs.answer: No registration required. You can start using any tool immediately without creating an account or providing personal information.

faqs.question: Are there any file size limits?
faqs.answer: No, there are no artificial file size limits. The only limitation is your browser's memory capacity, which can handle most typical files.

faqs.question: Can I use these tools on mobile devices?
faqs.answer: Yes, all tools are fully responsive and work perfectly on smartphones, tablets, and desktop computers.
